channel.title: [PI] ::update command [PI]
channel.description:
I have no ::update command on my PI server.
Can someone help me plz.
If you've got the code for it, it would help - and where do i put it?

item.title: [PI] ::update command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RyRyscape RyRyscape
item.description:
@RyRyscape wrote:

Insert this in commands.java

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerRights == 3) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
